response.overview: An anonymous bureaucrat traipses around the City of Toronto, repurposing hostile architecture as their playground. Featuring spliced audio of former mayor John Toryâ€™s victory speeches from 2014, 2018, and 2022 municipal election nights, bleak scenes are juxtaposed with a heavy-handed narrative of progress and inclusion. This video performance art is a counternarrative exploration of the surveillance and criminalization of poverty and what cities lose when they leave the most marginalized behind.
response.title: This is a Crisis
